page.title: 15SERVICES LOCAL AND SCHOOL
page.content: {LOCAL SERVICES Daily services are newspapers, post, bread and milk.Weekly deliveries are groceries,fish and soft drinks.The mobile library tours the area weekly. Fuel (i.e.coal,oil and calor gas) are delivered when ordered by individual customers. There is no bus service. {SCHOOL LIBRARY SERVICE.}Each Cheshire school can have up to 200 books,twice a year.The van covers up to 250 primary schools.They stay for an hour each time. {SCHOOL GROUNDS MAINTENANCE.}Three men do the mowing.Cheshire County Council employs them.They cover 20 Chesire District schools. They have tools in their van and do their own repairs. In winter they do border work.They often get bored.For lunch they go to a chip shop.
